message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.MM

This paper deals with gesture recognition using motion capture data and depth sensors, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed system uses deep neural networks for feature extraction and classification, which is a popular approach in machine learning (cs.LG and cs.AI). The system also includes a visualization component using deep autoencoder, which can be related to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and multimedia (cs.MM).
